profile:
Remediclean Inc.

Asbestos Removal in Lethbridge & Calgary, Mould Removal in Lethbridge & Calgary, Hazardous Material Abatement, Decontamination, Hantavirus, PCB, Biological Hazard Removal, Dust Control, Industrial Cleaning and Environmental Contractors in Lethbridge, Calgary & Surrounding Communities.  Professional & Certified. 

 

Remediclean is a professional environmental remediation service with over 25 years combined industry experience between key personnel.  Protection of the public, property, and safety of the workers are our primary objectives. We aim to build positive, lasting relationships through ethical and safe project management.

 

We are professionals in the hazardous materials remediation industry and our personnel have a reputable history of successful project management. Our management team has years of experience in a variety of markets; construction, demolition, hazardous materials abatement, waste management and recycling.  Our company is built on the foundations of strong ethical corporate governance, a passion for customer service and a drive for excellence in environmental compliance. 

 

We operate in Lethbridge, Calgary, and all surrounding communities. We will provide a free quotation and risk-assessment for your project. 

 

Please feel free to contact us, (toll-free 1-844-679-4766) regarding any questions you may have.











Asbestos removal, mould removal, asbestos lethbridge, mould lethbridge, asbestos abatement, mould abatement, hazmat, hantavirus, pcb, pathogen, flood, fire, disaster recovery, cleaning, industrial cleaning, Calgary, Lethbridge, Alberta.
